last_episode_to_air.name: Hazel vs. Hazel
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the quest to take down Other Hazel kicks into high gear, relationships are tested – and secrets are revealed.

name: Made For Love
overview: Thirty-something Hazel Green tries to escape a suffocating marriage — until she realizes her tech billionaire husband has implanted a revolutionary tracking device, the Made for Love, in her brain.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In the second season, in order to save her father’s life, Hazel returns to the Hub, Byron’s high-tech palace. But once inside, she and Byron both become ensnared by Gogol’s newest revolutionary (and dangerous) technology.

tagline: The only way out is back in.

episodes.name: User One
episodes.overview: After learning she will be the involuntary subject of her husband's latest piece of technology, Hazel Green flees her ten-year marriage and winds up in the most unexpected place, her estranged father Herbert’s house.

episodes.name: I Want a Divorce
episodes.overview: Father and daughter reconnect as they try to secure a plane for Hazel's getaway but when Byron’s microchip proves too powerful and his team tracks her down, Hazel is forced to confront her husband with a difficult request.

episodes.name: I Want This Thing Out of My Head
episodes.overview: A flashback to a news magazine's profile of "Made for Love" illuminates why Hazel made the decision to leave Byron and why she's determined to never return.

episodes.name: I Want a New Life
episodes.overview: Propelled by her dad to pitch in, Hazel reverts to old money-making schemes and runs into her former best friend Bangles, who inspires her to remember the person she was before Byron. After exhausting the ways to lead Hazel back home of her own volition, Byron reveals the frightening lengths he’s willing to go to get his wife back.

episodes.name: I Want a Lawyer
episodes.overview: As Hazel’s prolonged absence distracts him from his work, Byron uses any means necessary to sabotage her attempts to hire a divorce attorney. Meanwhile, Fiffany makes moves to rescue Zelda the dolphin and seeks out a desperate Herringbone for help extracting Hazel’s chip. Later, against caution, Byron makes a decision that will forever impact the future of “Made for Love” – and of his wife.

episodes.name: I Want You to Give a F*** About Me
episodes.overview: Just as Herbert calls on Judiff, an old flame, to help Hazel evade her husband’s omniscient gaze, Byron takes himself offline for a journey into the real world. After tensions between them come to a head, Hazel and Herbert find a healing path forward.

episodes.name: I Want to Feel Normal
episodes.overview: Realizing she and Diane share a surprising connection, Hazel goes out of her way to coordinate a special anniversary dinner for her father and his partner. Things get personal during Herb’s check-in with Judiff, prompting him to share his deepest secret. Byron delivers his first public press conference in years and gains surprising clarity about his marriage.

episodes.name: Let's Meet
episodes.overview: As Hazel meets Byron face-to-face to sign divorce papers, Herbert and Judiff scramble to prevent a potential disaster. Is it really goodbye, or is it a trap?

episodes.name: I Have A Rotting Finger
episodes.overview: After returning to the Hub with an unaware Herb, Hazel struggles to adapt as Byron begins yet another misguided bid to win her back. Meanwhile, the FBI launches an investigation into Gogol’s missing scientists.

episodes.name: We're Losing Time
episodes.overview: When Herb begins to grow suspicious, Hazel sends for help from Bangles, while Jasper reports for his first day at Gogol.

episodes.name: Diane...We're In Trouble
episodes.overview: While Hazel takes an unexpected interest in Byron’s work, Jasper makes a breakthrough – but not with his intended target. In the pasture, Lyle and Fiffany lean on memories, while Herb actively seeks a way out.

episodes.name: Another Byron, Another Hazel
episodes.overview: Byron and Hazel appear in front of Congress. Jasper deepens his connection with Zelda while intensifying his search for the scientists. “Other Hazel” forges a path into the real world.

episodes.name: You're Not the First
episodes.overview: After Hazel encourages Byron to visit home for the first time in decades, disturbing truths are revealed. As Lyle and Fiffany continue their search, Judiff embarks on one of her own, and Other Hazel makes contact with the outside.

episodes.name: Alice? Are You Listening?
episodes.overview: Hazel is moved by Byron’s meaningful gesture, while Other Hazel looks to bring Other Byron into the real world. Jasper enlists Zelda for a dangerous mission. Judiff’s search brings her closer to the truth.

episodes.name: Under Open Sky
episodes.overview: While Hazel takes Herb on a critical father-daughter camping trip, a suspicious Jasper makes a startling discovery.

episodes.name: Hazel vs. Hazel
episodes.overview: As the quest to take down Other Hazel kicks into high gear, relationships are tested – and secrets are revealed.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In the second season, in order to save her father’s life, Hazel returns to the Hub, Byron’s high-tech palace. But once inside, she and Byron both become ensnared by Gogol’s newest revolutionary (and dangerous) technology.
